attributes.action: halt the disastrous closure of local branch post offices in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Closing the local post offices will cause hardship to local people, particularly old or disabled people, and add to already long queues in the main branches. Local businesses who rely on quick convenient service will be financially hit, subpostmasters will be made unemployed. Many regional petitions are already running - this is a national need!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
